descriptions:
You look around and see nothing, the room is too dark to see much,
but you can see that the WALLS are gray brick that has moss and water dripping from the old STONES.

description-interactables.name: walls
descriptions: these are alarmingly vertical walls
these would make good castle walls you think

description-interactables.name: stones
descriptions: This ain't no philosopher's stone

you see a stone that's shaped like a kidney,
this must be a kidney stone you think

The room is a massive room with WOODEN BEAMS sweeping up into high arched ceilings.
It has bright CHANDELIERS glowing with hundreds of candles.
The wood looks dark and varnished. It reminds you of viking architecture.

description-interactables.name: chandeliers
descriptions: They are too bright to look at, so you don't
The metal looks like gold. Too bad you don't have a ladder

description-interactables.name: wooden beams
descriptions: The wood looks a little rotted, you might want to get out. Fast
This wood doesn't look safe enough to be under. You might want to get out, and fast
The room you walked into is dark and dank. It smells like mildew and has SLIME covering the FLOOR and walls.

description-interactables.name: Slime
descriptions: this looks to slimly to touch, you decide to save yourself and not touch it
The slime is gelatinous and looks like it could be alive

description-interactables.name: floor
descriptions: You look at towards your feet and see that you need new shoes, becoming completely distracted by your shoes
The floor is remarkably horizontal
You look around and see that this room looks like a storage room. There is CRATES and BARRELS of goods waiting for something to happen to them.
BARRELS and CRATES stack the side of the dock. There is a roaring RIVER that flows from one end of the cavern to the other.

description-interactables.name: Barrels
descriptions: It is an impeccably round barrel. It looks like it will roll.
These barrels look like their made of wood. Maybe they'll float.

description-interactables.name: Crates
descriptions: Its a box. A completely unremarkable box. It has very boxy features.
These crates are great

description-interactables.name: River
descriptions: The river is as clear as the crystals you see in the walls around you
The river is so loud and boisterous you wonder why anybody ships crates down it

The room is what appears to be a bedchamber. There is a massive four poster BED with red velvet CURTAINS.
You don't know who would want to sleep in a dungeon though.

description-interactables.name: Bed
descriptions: This bed looks like it was straight up stolen from wizarding school
I wonder what spell you would have to cast to make that bed float

description-interactables.name: Curtains
descriptions: The curtains look bloody and violent
The way the curtains moved in the wind looked like a ghost, i would know, I'm friends with a few

The room you walked into feels sterile. It has whitewashed walls with steel TABLES in the center.
Smaller tables hold all sorts of deadly looking TOOLS.

description-interactables.name: Tables
descriptions: The steel tables looked as cold and heartless as the enemies you slaughtered on your way to this room
This table looks a lot heavier than a duck

description-interactables.name: Tools
descriptions: The tools look deadly, you don't want to move any closer.
The tools look razor sharp. Like they could cut down the hearts of your enemies

The room is a hotel you realize. Torch SCONCES line the very expensive mahogany hallway.
The DOORS have brass name PLATES numbering 1 through 25

description-interactables.name: Sconces
descriptions: No they are not scones
Not what you get at a sconecutter

description-interactables.name: Plates
descriptions: It shines like a mirror you wonder who polishes these.
The plate is coldly unresponsive

description-interactables.name: Doors
descriptions: Do these doors even go anywhere. You eventually conclude these are not doors.
These doors are opaque.
